comments:
Version 3.0.m8
I am not sure how this happened but after starting eclipse, it came up in the
Resource perspective. I clicked on an editor tab, then clicked on the "Java
Browsing" perspective button and the UI got scrambled (see screenshot),
especially the title bar and tool bar areas. Somehow, the whole Java class
editor I selected is in error too, it was not when I quit eclipse last, probably
a different problem.

Created an attachment (id=9027)
Screenshot of messed up UI on XP SP1.

Here is the console output:
